title: Amami Dokoro
description:
Amami Dokoro R/ 01/ 02/ 03/ S
High-school student Ueda Shinichi always gets kissed by his childhood friend, Koiwa Amami, regardless of time or place. No matter how much he appeals to her common sense, she just won't stop her excessive kissing attacks. How can he get her to stop?

Flabby Oily Swim
The swimming club's ace falls into a slump when she can't get her times to improve. She concludes that her busty figure must be at fault. So, she turns to her club's advisor and teacher to help her with a special massage.

Iyashimai 01/ 02
Two sisters decide to take care of their injured brother's daily needs while he can't use his injured arms. That also includes his sexual needs.

MAX Akari
After the smart weirdo of the class overhears the saying "men can live on boobs alone", she decides to test out her new knowledge on her childhood friend.

Tenderness Unlimited
One day, a well-endowed girl shows up at a breast enthusiast's door and declares that he's been selected as an exclusive member of a strange organisation. One of his membership's benefits is to use her as he likes. What will he do?

Source: MU

Link:
